messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,

Our country needs real change, which only UKIP can give. We need a trading agreement with Europe but without being ruled by Brussels or Berlin. We need a sensible & fair migration policy. And we need proper support for the NHS and public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

mentions.candidate: I have lived in Barnet most of my life, own a travel agency, and organise networking groups for local businesses. I have been a borough councillor and a parliamentary candidate. In Chipping Barnet, I am a wasted vote - only UKIP can defeat the Tories.
mentions.tacticalSituation: In Chipping Barnet, I am a wasted vote - only UKIP can defeat the Tories.

issues.economy:
Control our borders

UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

Spend here, not abroad By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
issues.health:
Invest in the NHS

UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration:
Control our borders

UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare:
Fairer tax system

UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
